author: Sidney Fussell
title: Delivery Apps Offer Restaurants a Lifeline—at a Cost
description: Social distancing rules have reduced many eateries to delivery and take out. But apps like Uber Eats exact a 25 percent toll on their shrinking revenue.
content:
Miami chef Richard Hales was sitting on his couch two weeks ago, a rare moment of downtime for the owner of four restaurants, when he saw an ad for Uber Eats that joltedand angeredhim. 
Using #eatlocal, the promotion offered app users free delivery in the na… [+4574 chars]
